thread.title: CouPromTravel.com is pleased to Announce Joining Forces with TravelStarter
thread.title_full: CouPromTravel.com is pleased to Announce Joining Forces with TravelStarter

author: admin
title: CouPromTravel.com is pleased to Announce Joining Forces with TravelStarter
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/4/2015 @ 8:56 AM Companies mentioned in this article: CouProm Travel 
MIAMI, Sept. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- For the first time, CouProm Travel and TravelStarter are joining forces to offer CouProm mobile app to all the travel agencies worldwide that wants to create an extension of their services pre - during and after visiting the destination at no cost to the agency, giving the travel agencies and independent hotel owners the opportunity for branding recognition and incremental income while their clients receive extra benefits and savings. 
TravelStarter is a global crowdfunding platform for big and small ideas in tourism, and helps bring tourism back to the people. With half a century of industry expertise and catering only to the tourism industry, TravelStarter lives by the motto to, 'Travel globally and live locally!' 
"The idea is to make travel more accessible to people. It's not a secret that most people don't travel because it's expensive. With CouProm Travel mobile app, we allow people to save money accompanied with a real-time virtual concierge," said Founder & CEO of CouProm Travel Yoana Petit. 
The CouProm Travel App is an innovative tool developed to offer travel related packages in partnerships with travel agencies. Therefore travelers can get the concierge help they need and save on discounts while traveling with the use of the mobile app around the world. 
Travelers can download this completely free mobile app available on Google Play and App Store on iTunes , currently available in English and in Spanish; offering them at the palm of their hand a ticket to freedom while on a journey. 
About CouPromTravel.com CouProm Travel is your Virtual Travel Companion. The new way to save and enjoy while on the go. It's your mobile passport to book the best tourist attractions in real-time and an easy way to pay - wherever you are, and whenever you want it. It is accompanied with a real-time virtual concierge to help assist you while you are traveling around the United States, just like a local by using this mobile app.
